name: SpecSync Pre-Commit Validation
description: Validates staged changes for spec-code-test-doc alignment before commit
message:
Please validate the staged changes for spec-code-test-doc alignment using SpecSync rules. Check:
1. Spec alignment - verify code changes match specifications in .kiro/specs/
2. Test coverage - ensure tests exist for all code changes
3. Documentation - verify docs reflect API changes

Use the MCP git context tool to get staged changes, then apply the steering rules from .kiro/steering/rules.md to detect drift and generate suggestions if needed.
